definition: to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: The school will enroll new students in August.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校将于八月份招收新生。

sentences.english: The department started recruitment of two-year college students in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 1988年开始招收二年制地理专科生。

sentences.english: The school admits sixty new boys and girls every year.
sentences.chinese: 这所校每年招收六十名男女新生。

sentences.english: The UIBE is among a few of its kind in China that have enrolled the largest population of foreign students.
sentences.chinese: 该大学是招收外国留学生最多的学校之一。

sentences.english: They enrolled more than 500 new students.
sentences.chinese: 他们招收了五百多新生。

sentences.english: That the college will take in more new students this year is true.
sentences.chinese: 今年这所大学将招收更多新生是真的。

sentences.english: This year the company is on track to again double its hiring of U.S.-born MBAs.
sentences.chinese: 今年公司正准备加倍招收的在美国读的工商管理硕士。

sentences.english: Students ages 5 to 15 attend the experimental Khan Lab School.
sentences.chinese: 可汗实验学校招收的学生年龄在5岁到15岁之间。

sentences.english: Vigorously recruit young people into the group of countries.
sentences.chinese: 大力招收各国青少年入组。

sentences.english: The center enrolls postgraduates in the major direction of "Electronic Music Composition".
sentences.chinese: 该中心也招收“电子音乐作曲”方向的研究生。

sentences.english: Since 2001 the School of nursing started to enroll male students in BSN programs.
sentences.chinese: 学院于2001年开始打破常规招收男性学生。

sentences.english: We are looking to fill over 30 positions in the next 2 weeks, so apply today!
sentences.chinese: 我们将在未来的2周内招收30位，所以请立即申请。

sentences.english: We've taken on our full complement of new trainees for this year.
sentences.chinese: 我们今年招收的新学员已经满额了。

sentences.english: The Department of Literature, the predecessor of the school, started to enroll postgraduate students in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 学院前身中文系在50年代即开始招收研究生。
我校计划招收两个班，每班25名学生。

sentences.english: The Chinese Academy of Forestry started enrollment of graduate students from the whole country since 1979.
sentences.chinese: 中国林科院从1979年开始面向全国招收研究生。

definition: to enroll new students/to get students
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to select/to detail/to set apart/to appoint
to invite applications for a job/to recruit
quota/number of places/place (in an institution, a group etc)
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to enter oneself for an examination
